title: Mark Hughes: McLaren's internal rivalry undid its Singapore GP
summary: McLaren's stronger pace was undone by internal tactics, allowing Russell's Mercedes to take a comfortable Singapore GP victory.Mark Hughesanalyses the Marina Bay race

qa_pairs.question: Which team had a strong pace during the Singapore GP but faced issues due to internal tactics?
Who won the Singapore GP, capitalizing on McLaren's internal rivalry?
What is the significance of the Marina Bay circuit in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is known for its night race format.
wrong_options: It has a unique oval layout.
It is the longest circuit on the calendar.
